item.title: Delete :c
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:23, topic:477755”]Please add some media

[center][size=18pt]What is Volescent?[/size]
[size=14pt]Violescent is a unique Allstar server.
I’m the owner, I’m dedicated and I work on the server a lot.
For the base I used the original Allstar V2 source, and started from there.
This server is highly stable for a server of it’s type, and I’m constantly working on the stability.
We will add a pictures and videos soon.[/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Our Team:[/size]
[size=14pt]Owner and Developper: Alex
Co owner: Nasary
Administrators: (None yet)
Moderators: Dokan[/size][/center]
[center]

[size=18pt]The Server Features[/size]
[size=14pt]-Anti null and anti syi
-Bank all items in inventory
-Bank all equipped (it doesn’t add to the stack if you already have an item you’re depositing in your bank, other than that it works perfectly)
-::drags, An area to get tokkul to spend in the tokkul shop!
-::train, train at rock crabs, or at the Violescent training area.
-::dice, An area where trusted dicers can take bets! 55X2, or 75X3.
-Mystery box that gives random items, buy one at the home area!
-Tokens worth 1B each, for people who want more than 2147M.
-Jad - chance of dropping a fire cape.
-Slash bash - Drops the best armor and weapon in-game.
-General Graarador - Drops bandos, Mystery box. Hits up to 70.
-Evil chicken - Chance of dropping a rubber chicken.[/size]

[size=18pt]Skills[/size]

[size=14pt]-Runecrafting - The only way to get runes, it has been improved, you can craft many runes.
-Slayer - The slayer skill has been improved quite a lot, you must kill monsters to gain experience in Slayer.
-Firemaking - Fires appear, and turn into ash over time.
-Crafting - Get gems from the skilling area, and cut them for cash and crafting experience[/size]

[center][size=18pt]Media[/size]
[size=14pt](Will be added soon)[/size][/center]
[size=14pt]For more features, Visit our Site and play![/size]
[/center]

I shud make ur thread something like that. :P[/quote]

There’s a link to media. Look at the top under client dl and forums

Read full topic

[center][size=18pt]What is Volescent?[/size]

-Bank all items in inventory
-Bank all equipped (it doesn’t add to the stack if you already have an item you’re depositing in your bank, other than that it works perfectly)
-::drags, An area to get tokkul to spend in the tokkul shop!

[size=18pt]Skills[/size]

[size=14pt]-Runecrafting - The only way to get runes, it has been improved, you can craft many runes.
-Slayer - The slayer skill has been improved quite a lot, you must kill monsters to gain experience in Slayer.
-Firemaking - Fires appear, and turn into ash over time.

item.title: Delete :c
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:18, topic:477755”][quote author=TheLetterQArousesMe link=topic=595951.msg4196100#msg4196100 date=1357512647]

Don’t you think we’d all love to host a good old allstar? The problem is the SYI bot will easily take one down. So good luck getting around cheat clients etc.

Well I’ve added anti nuller, and anti SYI.
Also cheat clients will only be a problem to me when people who really care about messing with the server come on XD
and even then there’s not a lot that can be done other than woodcutting at jad haha.
[/quote]

Every fix you listed can be bypassed, I’m not doubting your knowledge of whatever language your programming in, but you need to improve the core wrether then content.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Ashley, post:4, topic:477755”]It encourages gambling though

Still, nothing beats a good ol’ Allstar :)[/quote]
Well some people like it, but meh, can’t say it’s my favorite thing but I added it by request.

And, I agree! I’m sick of PI’s loading 600+ and all the 700+ servers, can’t find an old school server these days… So I decided to host this haha.
